purpose: Enhanced Date wrapper with timezone management, ISO 8601 formatting, and interop with Google Sheets and PDF date formats
keyExports: DateEx — class wrapping Date with extended formatting and conversion methods
dateEx() — factory function to create a DateEx instance

keyPatterns.name: DateEx factory
keyPatterns.description: Use dateEx(date?) to create instances rather than new DateEx(); accepts Date, string, number, or nothing for now

keyPatterns.name: ISO with timezone offset
keyPatterns.description: toISOLocalString() produces ISO 8601 format with the local timezone offset instead of UTC Z suffix

architecture.keyDesign: Wraps native Date; provides fluent API for timezone, formatting, Julian Day, Google Sheets, and PDF date interop
